name: Mom's Easy Chicken Divan
author: iammykidzmom
summary: Mom shared this recipe with me after many years of making it for company. I always thought there was more to it that made it such a special occasion dish, but come to find out, it's easy and no-fuss! This is an excellent meal when served with a fruit salad, French bread, and/or a tossed green salad.
ingredients: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans cream of chicken soup
½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread rice evenly in prepared baking dish
Arrange broccoli over rice and layer chicken on top
Mix cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and curry powder in a bowl; pour over chicken
Mix bread crumbs and melted butter in a small bowl; sprinkle over cheese
Bake in preheated oven until sauce is bubbly and cheese is melted, 25 to 30 minutes
